data.marketing-page-about-title: About andcards - who we are and what we do | andcards
data.marketing-page-about-description: andcards is how people use book, pay, and chat at coworking spaces. It's how coworking spaces become digital products that live in pockets of their residents.
data.marketing-page-about-mission-description: At andcards we believe that there is a better way to work. Spending years in a gray office surrounded by the same faces is history. Our team is passionate about the flexible workspace future where people are free from office walls. From experiencing thousands of amazing workspaces around the world to managing and automating workspaces — andcards products aim to revolutionize work culture at all levels.
data.marketing-page-about-mission-title: Our mission is to make coworking spaces people love
data.marketing-page-about-team-description: One of our core values is transparency: we keep no secrets from each other and from the world. See how we run our company in {handbookUrl}.
data.marketing-page-about-what-we-do-kiosk-de: App for tablets in meeting rooms.
